languages.text: "Ежели не Он, то кто?" {n}Вир растерянно хлопает глазами.{/n} "Лишь у Священного достаточно сил, чтобы прогнать сияющую посланницу с неба и опустить вечную ночь на мир, заставив его содрогнуться! А во тьму запустить Кошмаров".

traits.locale_text: "Ежели не Он, то кто?" {n}Вир растерянно хлопает глазами.{/n} "Лишь у Священного достаточно сил, чтобы прогнать сияющую посланницу с неба и опустить вечную ночь на мир, заставив его содрогнуться! А во тьму запустить Кошмаров".

languages.text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."
languages.original_text: "Ежели не Он, то кто?" {n}Вир растерянно хлопает глазами.{/n} "Лишь у Священного достаточно сил, чтобы прогнать сияющую посланницу с неба и опустить вечную ночь на мир, заставив его содрогнуться! А во тьму запустить Кошмаров".

traits.locale_text: "Who else but the Exalted One?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

"Who else but the Exalted One?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

"Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

"Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

"Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

languages.text: 「他ならぬあの御方しかいないでしょう！」{n}ヴィルは困惑したまま瞬きした。{/n}「ただあの御方だけが、輝く使者を空から追い払い、世界を永遠の闇で覆い、震え上がらせる力を持っています！そして、夜を悪夢で満たすのです」
languages.original_text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

traits.locale_text: 「他ならぬあの御方しかいないでしょう！」{n}ヴィルは困惑したまま瞬きした。{/n}「ただあの御方だけが、輝く使者を空から追い払い、世界を永遠の闇で覆い、震え上がらせる力を持っています！そして、夜を悪夢で満たすのです」

languages.text: « Qui d'autre que Lui ? {n}Surpris, Vir cligne des yeux.{/n} Lui seul possède une puissance suffisante pour nous apporter {mf|un messager|une messagère} et plonger le monde, tremblant, dans une obscurité éternelle ! C'est aussi Lui qui peuple les nuits de cauchemars. »
languages.original_text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

traits.locale_text: « Qui d'autre que Lui ? {n}Surpris, Vir cligne des yeux.{/n} Lui seul possède une puissance suffisante pour nous apporter {mf|un messager|une messagère} et plonger le monde, tremblant, dans une obscurité éternelle ! C'est aussi Lui qui peuple les nuits de cauchemars. »

languages.text: “如果不是祂，那还能是谁呢？”{n}维尔困惑地眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“只有祂才有力量驱走祂明亮的使者，让世界笼罩在永恒的黑暗之中，让整个世界颤抖！也只有祂，才能让黑夜充满了梦魇。”
languages.original_text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

traits.locale_text: “如果不是祂，那还能是谁呢？”{n}维尔困惑地眨了眨眼睛。{/n}“只有祂才有力量驱走祂明亮的使者，让世界笼罩在永恒的黑暗之中，让整个世界颤抖！也只有祂，才能让黑夜充满了梦魇。”

languages.text: «¿Quién si no el Altísimo?». {n}Vir pestañea confundido.{/n} «Solo Él tiene la fuerza para expulsar {mf|al Emisario|a la Emisaria} resplandeciente de los cielos y envolver el mundo en las tinieblas más sempiternas! Y volverlo en un lugar hostil y lleno de pesadillas».
languages.original_text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién si no el Altísimo?». {n}Vir pestañea confundido.{/n} «Solo Él tiene la fuerza para expulsar {mf|al Emisario|a la Emisaria} resplandeciente de los cielos y envolver el mundo en las tinieblas más sempiternas! Y volverlo en un lugar hostil y lleno de pesadillas».

languages.text: "Wer, wenn nicht er?" {n}Vir blinzelt verwirrt.{/n} "Nur er hat die Stärke, den leuchtenden Boten vom Himmel zu treiben und die Welt in ewige Dunkelheit zu stürzen und zittern zu lassen! Und die Nacht bis zum Rand mit Albträumen zu füllen."
languages.original_text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

traits.locale_text: "Wer, wenn nicht er?" {n}Vir blinzelt verwirrt.{/n} "Nur er hat die Stärke, den leuchtenden Boten vom Himmel zu treiben und die Welt in ewige Dunkelheit zu stürzen und zittern zu lassen! Und die Nacht bis zum Rand mit Albträumen zu füllen."

languages.text: "Kim olacak başka?" {n}Vir, kafası karışmış bir şekilde gözlerini kırpıştırıyor.{/n} "Göklerden gelen, ışıldayan Elçi'yi kontrol edip dünyayı ebedî bir karanlığa gömecek, gökleri titretecek ve geceleri tıka basa Kâbuslarla dolduracak güce sahip başka kim var?"
languages.original_text: "Who else but He?" {n}Vir blinks in confusion.{/n} "Only He has the strength to drive the shining Messenger from the sky and shroud the world in eternal darkness, making it tremble! And fill the night to the brim with Nightmares."

traits.locale_text: "Kim olacak başka?" {n}Vir, kafası karışmış bir şekilde gözlerini kırpıştırıyor.{/n} "Göklerden gelen, ışıldayan Elçi'yi kontrol edip dünyayı ebedî bir karanlığa gömecek, gökleri titretecek ve geceleri tıka basa Kâbuslarla dolduracak güce sahip başka kim var?"
